entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
